definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
full moon/to hope/to expect/to visit/to gaze (into the distance)/to look towards/towards
15th day of month (lunar calendar)/old variant of 望[wang4]

sentences.english: A: Let’s just hope the politicians don’t figure out a way to spend it.
sentences.chinese: 让我们巴望政治家们不会想着法子把它用掉吧。

sentences.english: She readvertisement the long-ould likeiciphadvertisementd letter with a tearful smile.
sentences.chinese: 她带着含泪的微笑读那封巴望已久的信。

sentences.english: For example: He [father] sent John to the university and was eager to have him distinguish himself.
sentences.chinese: 他送约翰上大学，巴望能让儿子出类拔萃。

sentences.english: Among them more outstanding of a characteristic be a desire association.
sentences.chinese: 其中较凸起的一个特征是巴望交往。

sentences.english: Even the coconut trees seemed swollen and expectant.
sentences.chinese: 连椰子树都似乎憋得头昏脑胀，巴望能舒上一口气。

sentences.english: Let’s just hope the politicians don’t figure out a way to spend it.
sentences.chinese: 我们就巴望政治家们别想着法子用了它才好。

sentences.english: Desire to one day you can chastened, then I still love you.
sentences.chinese: 巴望有一天你能变乖，到那时我依然爱你。

sentences.english: Participants monitor the site, hoping to secure a great bargain.
sentences.chinese: 竞标者盯着网站，巴望拣个大便宜。

definition: (coll.) to be eager for/to long for/to look forward to
to talk about often/to reminisce about/to keep repeating/to keep harping on/to discuss
to argue noisily/to shout/to make widely known/to reproach
sighing voice, wailing breath (idiom)/to heave deep sighs/to sigh in despair
to fawn on/to curry favor with/to make up to
erhua variant of 快點|快点[kuai4 dian3]
